problem.p: A student is standing on a bathroom scale inside an elevator. The elevator is moving. The magnitude of the normal force acting on the student is 500 N. The reading of the scale must then be:

choice.name: foil4
choice.text: either less or greater than 500 N, depending on the direction of the elevator's velocity

choice.name: foil5
choice.text: either less or greater than 500 N, depending on the direction of the elevator's acceleration
